body: At 14th level, a summoner's life becomes linked to his brood. This functions as the life bond ability, except the broodmaster can only transfer damage to one eidolon in the brood at a time. If that eidolon takes enough damage to send it back to its home plane, all excess damage remains with the broodmaster, killing him. This ability replaces life bond.
name: Brood Bond
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Summoner Archetypes/Broodmaster/Hordes of Summoned Monsters/Brood Bond
